scripts.esbuild: rm -rf build; mkdir build; esbuild src/main.js --bundle --global-name=daikon --platform=node --outfile=build/daikon.js; esbuild src/main.js --bundle --global-name=daikon --platform=node --minify --outfile=build/daikon-min.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build; mkdir build; browserify --standalone daikon src/main.js -o build/daikon.js; uglifyjs build/daikon.js -o build/daikon-min.js
scripts.doc: rm -rf build; mkdir build; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md src/*.js > build/docs.md
